comment.comment-body: N.Wirth, 16.4.2016 / 4.4.2017 / 31.5.2019 Oberon compiler; code generator for RISC
Code generator for Oberon compiler for RISC processor. Procedural interface to Parser OSAP; result in array "code". Procedure Close writes code-files

Item forms and meaning of fields: mode r a b -------------------------------- Const - value (proc adr) (immediate value) Var base off - (direct adr) Par - off0 off1 (indirect adr) Reg regno RegI regno off - Cond cond Fchain Tchain
frame offset changed in SaveRegs and RestoreRegs
origins of lists of locations to be fixed up by loader
same as Put1, but with range test -10000H <= im < 10000H
handling of forward reference, fixups of branch addresses and constant tables
loading of operands and addresses into registers
Items: Conversion from constants or from Objects on the Heap to Items on the Stack
copies string from ORS-buffer to ORG-string array
Code generation for Selectors, Variables, Constants
one entry of type descriptor extension table
NIL belongs to every pointer type
x, y are char arrays or strings
Branches, procedure calls, procedure prolog and epilog
R0, R1, R2 saved on stack
interrupt return, restore R2, R1, R0
